text: The 2021 Colombian protests are a series of ongoing protests in Colombia that began on 28 April 2021 against increased taxes proposed by the government of President Iván Duque Márquez. It was proposed to fund Ingreso Solidario, a universal basic income social program. While some protests were peaceful, some turned violent with many rioting and burning public transportation vehicles. On International Workers' Day, tens of thousands of Colombians protested on 1 May in one of the largest demonstrations during the wave of protests, with cacerolazos heard in various cities. The following day, more violent protests erupted with six civilians being killed. ==Related pages== *2019–20 Colombian protests ==References== Category:2021 crimes Category:2021 in South America Category:2021 riots Category:April 2021 events Category:Arson Category:Crime in South America 2021 protests Category:June 2021 events Category:May 2021 events Category:2021 protests
